title: _SET_VEHICLE_MAX_SPEED
content:
0xBAA045B4E42F3C06// SetVehicleMaxSpeed
void _SET_VEHICLE_MAX_SPEED(Vehicle vehicle, float speed);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.speed: The speed limit in meters per second.To reset the max speed, set the speed value to 0.0 or lower.
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for _SET_VEHICLE_MAX_SPEED
_etVehicleMaxSpeed(vehicle, 0.0)
